name: Kiwee Beta
description:
Change log

Version 0.0.3

  • Level generation is now seed based so you can retry the same level
  • Seed input added to title screen / level over screen
  • Levels now have a maximum distance with a goal to land on
  • Scoring now considers # of kiwis collected, time to clear, and landing

Version 0.0.2

  • Attempted to reduce ways grapple will break unexpectedly
  • Added in bouncy obstacles
  • Added new chunk variations
  • Trail effect when zooming on grapple
  • Normalized music track to hopefully match sfx levels closer
  • Graphical tweaks
